about_the_game:
This Cosmetic DLC pack is entirely derived from the work of community developer "Sgt Joe" (and friends) on the Gameplay Overhaul Mutator - and all revenue from this DLC is shared with that team, to help encourage their work. So, if you enjoy the work of some of our amazing community creators, feel free to show that appreciation by buying this DLC pack!

And this pack contains almost 40 different items, including:

For the ARVN forces:

  • Airborne and BeoGam camo variants tunics
  • SatCong tunic variant
  • BeoGam Boonie
  • Bare M1 helmet with flag
  • Bare M1 helmet with Ranger camo paint
  • Bare M1 helmet with bullet belt

For the PAVN forces:

  • Dac Cong camo variants for tunics
  • Netted pith helmet
  • Pith helmet with camo fabric draped over
  • Pith helmet with netting draped over
  • PLA cap

For the NLF forces:

  • Brown and White variants of the tunics
  • Pith helmet with foliage
  • Rising Storm 1 Japanese helmet

US Forces:

  • Vest Open Tunic Variant

US Helmet Variants:

  • "I am become death"
  • "1M" (M1 but backwards)
  • Blood Type
  • "F*ck it"
  • Grenade launcher rounds
  • Countdown to leaving
  • M16 magazines
  • "Make war not love"
  • Grenade pins
  • "I'm not a tourist"

So, if you enjoy the work of some of our amazing community creators, feel free to show that appreciation by buying this DLC pack!

And this pack contains almost 40 different items, including:

name: Rising Storm 2: Vietnam - Sgt Joe's Support Bundle DLC

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: RS2 Vietnam - Sgt Joe's Support Bundle - $14.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Rising Storm 2: Vietnam - Sgt Joe's Support Bundle DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.5GHz or AMD Phenom @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: UNSUPPORTED HARDWARE: 32-bit Operating Systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.2GHz or AMD @ 4.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R9 270X or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

short_description: This Cosmetic DLC pack is entirely derived from the work of community developer "Sgt Joe" (and friends) on the Gameplay Overhaul Mutator - and all revenue from this DLC is shared with that team, to help encourage their work.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
